reviews.review: 很好玩，虽然偶尔会头脑风暴，游戏内容虽简单却不失复杂，玩的时候别往难处想。和朋友一起玩非常Nice！！！

An amazing game. honestly one of the best I've ever played, the story is so amazing and the mechanics are so simplistic yet so satisfying. And don't get me started on the attention to detail and the humour, OMG the voice lines in this game are sometimes quite dark but they are SO DAMN FUNNY. I highly recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a new game to play, it's not too long, but though it may be short compared to some other games it packs so much into what time it has.




also the songs are really good

what else is there to say that hasn't already been said. this game is legendary. make sure you play the first one first so you can appreciate everything this sequel has to offer. you will not regret a single second.

I have watched gameplay of Portal 2 in the past but only just now finished it, and it's fantastic! 

The puzzles are relatively similar to those in Portal 1, but obviously improved and sometimes utilize the different gels unique to Portal 2. The story is a little different, tragic in some parts but still entertaining and funny, and Cave Johnson (JK Simmons) is one of the best additions to the Portal universe!
